conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a cannabis (abused substance) movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I'd highly recommend "Knocked Up" for you! This comedic film follows a fun-loving guy who unexpectedly finds himself in a serious relationship after a one-night stand, and their journey together is both hilarious and heartwarming. With an all-star cast including Seth Rogen, Kristen Wiig, and Paul Rudd, it's a must-watch if you're looking for a light-hearted movie about cannabis culture.

If you're interested in a more suspenseful take on the subject, "The Stuff" might be up your alley. It tells the story of a mysterious goo that takes over the world and turns people into mindless snackers. With stars like Danny Aiello and Garrett Morris, it's definitely worth checking out! Enjoy your movie time!
